description:
Microsoft has launched a new type of personal computer designed with AI capabilities, underscoring the company’s commitment to integrating cutting-edge technology across its product lineup.  This new category not only boosts Microsoft’s ventures but also positions it to compete directly with AI-led advancements from tech giants such as Alphabet and Apple. During an event at Microsoft’s campus in Redmond, Washington, CEO... Read more »

The post Microsoft unveils new Copilot+ PCs featuring advanced AI capabilities appeared first on
title: Microsoft unveils new Copilot+ PCs featuring advanced AI capabilities
